backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two personalization-related features to affected frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining color tokens, dark mode values, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Animated floating hearts background component respecting reducedâ€‘motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/PersonalizationP: Side panel UI for editing personalized fields with defaults like "my lovely baby" and "February 8th, 2026".
frontend/src/components/ProposeDayPage.t: Main proposal flow managing multiple view states, personalization inputs, defaults, and interactive transitions.
frontend/src/components/SuccessCelebrati: Success screen showing animated confetti hearts and celebratory messaging.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and updating a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no frontend data-fetching hooks are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom color variables, dark mode palettes, fonts, and several animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, defaults, and architectural notes for the romantic proposal website.
